summary.span: 提供逻辑以建立计时器并异步等待计时器过期。

span.span: Provides the logic to establish a timer and to wait, asynchronously, for timer's expiration.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 当通知其计时器已过期时， 将完成其执行。When notified that its timer has expired, a completes its execution. 可以对 设置超时，以便工作流在恢复执行前暂停。You can set a time out on the so that your workflow pauses before resuming execution. 可以使用 来指定 。You specify the using . 这将导致工作流在经过指定的 前暂停。This causes your workflow to pause until the specified has elapsed. 在活动开始前， 类运行与 事件相关联的代码方法，可以使用代码旁置方法初始化 属性。The class runs the code method associated with the event before the activity starts and the code-beside method can be used to initialize the property. 可以保证一达到指示的 ，就会完成 。The is guaranteed to complete no sooner than the indicated . 延迟可能会经过更长的时间，因为计时器通知可能会在达到 之后的某个时间发生。The delay can take longer because the timer notification might occur some time after the is reached. 发生更长延迟的原因之一是工作流在服务器环境中在高系统压力下运行。One reason for a longer delay is if the workflow is running under high system stress in a server environment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 类的新实例。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class. 此代码示例摘自 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 文件中的“SimpleStateMachineWorkflow”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file. 有关更多信息，请参见“简单状态机”。For more information, see Simple State Machine. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应使用此事件来设置 的 。This event should not be used to set the for a . 而应在工作流的 `InitializeComponent` 方法中设置超时持续时间。The time-out duration should be set in the workflow's `InitializeComponent` method instead.

summary.span: 获取或设置工作流中延迟的持续时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the duration of the delay in the workflow.

value.span: 指示工作流中延迟时间长度的 。

span.span: A that indicates the length of the delay in the workflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性中设置的时间段确定工作流继续执行下一活动前处于空闲状态的时间。The time period set in this property determines the time the workflow will sit idle before the workflow proceeds to the next activity. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 属性的值设置为 3 秒。The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of the property to 3 seconds. 此代码假定 `delay2` 的类型为 。This code assumes that `delay2` is of type . 此代码示例摘自 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 文件中的“SimpleStateMachineWorkflow”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [简单状态机](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e)。For more information, see [Simple State Machine](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
